p: The chloroplast genome sequence of Malva wigandii has been deposited in GenBank under MT304827 ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore/MT304827.1/). The data supporting this finding are available in NCBI Bioproject ID PRJNA613244 ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/?term=PRJNA613244), Biosample ID SAMN17320626 ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/biosample/?term=SAMN17320626) and SRA SRX9910562 ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=SRX9910562).
